name: RunningGuru
0:
”Alexa ask Running Guru to inspire me.”
”Alexa ask Running Guru to motivate me.”
”Alexa ask Running Guru for motivation.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: running guru
des: Every Runner experiences some low days when he/she needs just a little push to get out there and sweat out a run. Running Guru tells inspirational quotes to motivate runners to go for their runs. Just ask Alexa to tell Running Guru to tell me something or inspire me or motivate me.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
